Andrew Forward wrote:
>> Ilja wrote:
>> What's a test category?
> 
> I believe some of the features stem from NUnit 2.2.
> Categories is an excellent idea that I use quite a bit.  In
> essence, you are group tests (fixtures etc) into groups and just run
> those groups. 

IIRC, this can be done using Junit, for example by tagging TestCases
with Interfaces and using a specialized TestRunner. I'd guess the same
could be done with annotations without touching the Junit core library
at all.

Cheers, Ilja
